subject: The Skinny: Tuesday. May 8, 2007
body:

An Exit Strategy For Wolfowitz? 
A deal may be in the works to end Paul D. Wolfowitz's troubled tenure 
      as president of the World Bank. 
And Washington goes "gaga" over Queen Elizabeth II. 
Joel Roberts has the highlights of the day's headlines.  More...
